channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL

item.title: Report E-2023090439
item.description:
Report E-2023090439

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-12
  • City: MIAMI
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN MIAMI, FLORIDA, CARGO WAS BEING INSPECTED FOR AIR MOVEMENT TO NICARAGUA. ONE BOX WAS FOUND TO HAVE SIGNS OF MARKS AND LABELS HAVING PREVIOUSLY BEEN CUT OFF THE PACKAGE. INNER CONTENT INSPECTION REVEALED LITHIUM BATTERY PACKS FOR HP LAPTOPS INSIDE THE BOX.

item.title: Report X-2023081589
item.description:
Report X-2023081589

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-19
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. Upon inspection found 1 can of Fleetrite A/C FLush solvent 1-gallon had small dents on sides & near lid along with loose lid resulted to leakage. DescribePack: Can had small dents on sides & near lid along with loose lid resulted to leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined.

item.title: Report X-2023081582
item.description:
Report X-2023081582

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: PORT SAINT LUCIE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Received leaking 5 gallon steel pail of ZEP brake wash on the unload side leaking from a dented, bent lid. The pail was contained in a hazmat bag and pail and brought to the QA cage for processing, DescribePack: The lid failed due to be dented somehow during transportation. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The metal pail was placed into a hazmat bag and pail to prevent leakage from going on to any packages nearby or equipment.

item.title: Report X-2023081537
item.description:
Report X-2023081537

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: WEST PALM BEACH
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was being unloaded from preload sort when a package handler quickly identified the damaged hazmat and brought it to the sort managers attention. After then it was brought to QA for inspection and damage report. DescribePack: Due to the leakage from the loose caps the package sustained heavy damage to the top of the box/packaging. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After inspection caps were retightened and tested to ensure that they will contain the corrosive liquid and for future PGH disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023081538
item.description:
Report X-2023081538

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found a plastic bag containing 1 bottle of Athena Reset 1-gallon had loose lid resulted to leakage. Outer packaging doesn't display any hazmat markings but the bottle itself displays a Oxidizer & Corrosive diamond. Package was shipped as a normal package & not as hazmat. DescribePack: Bottle had loose lid resulted to leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081528
item.description:
Report X-2023081528

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The 5 gal metal pail of Signatory Products 7666 – MRC-ALT arrived to the station heavily dented and leaking. It was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment and inspection. DescribePack: It was discovered the it also had a small punctured on the side causing it to leak. The shipper did not use a shipping box or inner packing materials. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon arrival the metal pail was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment. No release was found.

item.title: Report X-2023081251
item.description:
Report X-2023081251

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-16
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package strapped to wooden board was found wet. Upon inspection, 1 Deka 1231PMF lead acid battery was defective due to leaking out on sides. outer package display no hazmat or non-spillable battery markings. DescribePack: Battery was defective due to leaking out of sides. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081141
item.description:
Report X-2023081141

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found a bag containing 1 bottle of Barnacle Buster 1-gallon crushed & had loose lid resulted to leakage. Other bottles in bags are undamaged. The large paper made shipping label used was covering a Limited Quantity diamond label. DescribePack: Bottle was crushed & had loose lid resulted to leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023081772
item.description:
Report X-2023081772

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 1.5 POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING SEAFOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED. OUTER BOX IS PREPRINTED RUSH, PERISHABLE AND HAS ORIENTATION ARROWS. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM FLORIDA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 24390W, AMAZON MFN, 333 108TH AVE. NE, BELLEVUE WA 98004.

item.title: Report E-2023090223
item.description:
Report E-2023090223

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T15:12:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: CSX CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On 08-31-23 at 1321 a FRA Inspector in the CSXT Edgewood Yard discovered UTLX645049, a loaded tank car of Crude Sulfate Terpentine leaking vapors from manway. The car was isolated and Georgia-Pacific LLC was notified (CHEMTREC Report #2023083100164). Hepaco LLC, a CSXT response contractor, was dispatched to the scene and found the vapors were being released from the manway. The issue identified and corrective actions were communicated to the shipper contact Tom Davidson and 404-376-9550. Contractor personnel opened manway and found that gasket was damaged, Hepaco installed a new manway gasket and tool tightened manway safety bolts. The leak was secured and the car released for transport. This incident did not require a special switching move.

item.title: Report E-2023090102
item.description:
Report E-2023090102

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: LAKELAND
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Two 5 gallon metal pails were crushed due to heavy freight, released 0.75 gallon.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found at 100 belt. Upon discovery I immediately placed the package in a double lined hazmat bin. DescribePack: A bottle cap was loose, a small amount of liquid leaked from bottle, liquid leaked onto package and made a hole in that area. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in a double lined hazmat bin

item.title: Report X-2023081626
item.description:
Report X-2023081626

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: COCOA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Driver found box leaking on delivery truck and placed inside several plastic bags to bring back to the station for inspection. DescribePack: 4 1gal bottles of HypoCleanse Isopropyl Alcohol 99% Tech Grade in box with no Hazmat or Limited Quantity markings. Bottles separated into 2 each on either side of a single cardboard divider. Cap on 1 bottle was misaligned and spilled 80% of the liquid into the box. SDS says Class 3 PG II but box only had printed directional arrows and no Hazmat service. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Driver placed box inside several plastic bags and gave to QA for inspection when he returned to the station

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package arrived already wet to the station and it was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment and inspection DescribePack: All 4 plastic bottles of Formical-4 fixative decalcifier are crushed and leaked from loose caps. Only slotted partitions were used as inner packing materials. The bottles have a seal but the caps were not secured. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The wet package was placed in a hazmat bag and bin, upon arrival, for further containment. No release was found.

item.title: Report E-2023060386
item.description:
Report E-2023060386

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-16T00:32:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-06
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CIRCLE K
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 1
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On May 06, 2023, at 0150ET, Circle K reported 9,000-gallons of gasoline released from a 9,003-gallon tanker trailer impacting the asphalt roadway, soil, gravel and a nearby storm drain due to being involved in a multi-vehicle accident. No waterways were impacted. A utility pole was also impacted. The tanker was rear-ended causing the saddle tanks to release the product, as a result the tanker caught fire. The driver reportedly passed away and the roadway was closed. The fire department put out the fire with foam. On May 06, 2023, at 0720 ET, HEPACO arrived onsite to clean up the remaining impact and debris. HEPACO replaced the damaged power pole and flushed the impacted drain with 800-gallons of water. The soil area was excavated and boom was deployed at the drain. HEPACO collected and containerized 1,700 gallons of liquid into a vacuum truck and (2) 55-gallons metal drums of gasoline impacted rags.
